item.title: Projects
item.description: Bellow you will find some of the projects I created. BETA: stands for B basEd Testing Approach. It is a tool-supported approach, based on the B-Method formal notation, to generate test cases. It uses restrictions described on a B model, such as invariants, preconditions and conditional statements, to create unit tests for an operation. You can read more about BETA on my Ph.D thesis, in some of the papers here and in the tool’s website.

item.title: Reading
item.description: Here is a list of books that I’ve read and that I usually recommend to people: Debugging Teams: Better Productivity Through Collaboration by Brian W.
